subject: RE: [junit] Adding setUp() and tearDown() to TestSuite
msgSnippet: Hi David, ... Why would you want it? It already there, just have a look at the extensions: class TestSetup. Use it, if you need it! Regards, Jörg
messageBody:
Hi David,

> I would like to get the group's opinion about adding setUp() and
> tearDown() methods to the TestSuite class

Why would you want it? It already there, just have a look at the extensions: class TestSetup. Use it, if you need it!

Regards,
Jörg
